name: package.json
description: This web project simulates the game of ***BlackJack***. It's made from scratch by simply using ***Javascript*** and a little of ***CSS*** for styling ​💻. The cool thing is that the app simulates a real deck that throws and remove cards 🤩​.  When deck is empty, cards are re-shuffled (a simple alert notifies the user 🧑‍💻​)
author: LanceGiave96
